name: Memoryworks
description:
I was struck by an idea at midnight one night, and made this in the few hours before I passed out for bed time.

Memoryworks is a twist on the old Simon formula. Instead of repeating back a sequence, the sequence grows as you play! Click on the checkers in the same order that they are placed on the board, and get as many as you can!

Thanks for checking out my game! :)
